name: pressapps-name
description: A standardized, organized, object-oriented foundation for building high-quality WordPress Plugins.

scripts.scss:min: node-sass --output-style compressed src/public/scss/public.scss > public/css/pressapps-knowledge-base-public.css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/admin/scss/admin.scss > admin/css/pressapps-knowledge-base-admin.css
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run concat && npm run scss
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run uglify && npm run scss:min
scripts.postinstall: npm run concat && npm run scss

author: PressApps
